name: VR - HillSide Tourist Roller Coaster Pro
name_original: VR - HillSide Tourist Roller Coaster Pro
description:
Real Rio VR Roller Coaster gives you a real simulation of Disney world with your vr glasses. So let's wear your card board vr glasses and take your step into a world of fun land. Enjoy a real thrilling rides with effects of virtual reality and get a fun of real roller coaster wherever you be. Real vr roller coaster is an ultimate free game helps you to enjoy multiple rides with crazy adventure. Just use pocket glasses to find a real crazy ride which are ready to raise your adrenaline with high moving roller coaster. Don't forget to tighten your seat belt to avoid any danger. Enjoy endless Real Rio VR Roller Coaster.
Features
Incredible rides and endless journey.
Real rotation of 360 degree.
Wear vr to get perfect navigation.
Smooth 3d graphics.
